Class MessageGsonConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization.gson.MessageGsonConverter

    @Dependent
public class MessageGsonConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<Message>
    Serializes Message object. This class must be in Dependent to allow us to discover generic type.
